languages.text: Разведка доносит: Архонт друкари "играет в людей" — подчинила себе высокопоставленного чиновника и властвует колонией из теней. Она творит чудовищные вещи, но неожиданно хорошо справляется с правлением.

An intelligence report has come in stating that a Drukhari Archon is "playing at humans": having bent a high-ranking official to her will, she is now effectively running the colony from the shadows. She is committing unthinkable atrocities but is surprisingly good at governing.
languages.original_text: Разведка доносит: Архонт друкари "играет в людей" — подчинила себе высокопоставленного чиновника и властвует колонией из теней. Она творит чудовищные вещи, но неожиданно хорошо справляется с правлением.

traits.locale_text: An intelligence report has come in stating that a Drukhari Archon is "playing at humans": having bent a high-ranking official to her will, she now effectively runs the colony from the shadows. She commits unthinkable atrocities, but is surprisingly good at ruling.
A Drukhari raid targets the planet and drags away thousands of people aboard their vessels!

An intelligence report has come in stating that a Drukhari Archon is "playing at humans": having bent a high-ranking official to her will, she is now effectively running the colony from the shadows. She is committing unthinkable atrocities but is surprisingly good at governing.
A Drukhari raid targets the planet and drags away thousands of people aboard their vessels!

An intelligence report has come in stating that a Drukhari Archon is "playing at humans": having bent a high-ranking official to her will, she is now effectively running the colony from the shadows. She is committing unthinkable atrocities but is surprisingly good at governing.

An intelligence report has come in stating that a Drukhari Archon is "playing at humans": having bent a high-ranking official to her will, she is now effectively running the colony from the shadows. She is committing unthinkable atrocities but is surprisingly good at governing.

languages.text: Un rapport vous est parvenu qui évoque une archonte drukhari se faisant passer pour une humaine. Après avoir circonvenu un officier gradé, elle administre désormais la colonie depuis les ombres. Si elle se livre à des atrocités innommables, le fait est que sa capacité à gouverner force le respect.
languages.original_text: An intelligence report has come in stating that a Drukhari Archon is "playing at humans": having bent a high-ranking official to her will, she is now effectively running the colony from the shadows. She is committing unthinkable atrocities but is surprisingly good at governing.

traits.locale_text: Un rapport vous est parvenu qui évoque une archonte drukhari se faisant passer pour une humaine. Après avoir circonvenu un officier gradé, elle administre désormais la colonie depuis les ombres. Si elle se livre à des atrocités innommables, le fait est que sa capacité à gouverner force le respect.

languages.text: 諜報機関より、デュカーリ・アーコンが「人間をおもちゃにしている」という報告が入ってきた。高位の士官を意のままに操り、コロニーを実質的に支配している。彼女は想像を絶するような残虐行為を行っているが、その統治能力は驚くほど高い。
languages.original_text: An intelligence report has come in stating that a Drukhari Archon is "playing at humans": having bent a high-ranking official to her will, she is now effectively running the colony from the shadows. She is committing unthinkable atrocities but is surprisingly good at governing.

traits.locale_text: 諜報機関より、デュカーリ・アーコンが「人間をおもちゃにしている」という報告が入ってきた。高位の士官を意のままに操り、コロニーを実質的に支配している。彼女は想像を絶するような残虐行為を行っているが、その統治能力は驚くほど高い。

languages.text: 某份报告声称，黑暗灵族的某位执政官正在“操纵人类”。这位执政官操纵了政府的高级官员，成为了殖民地的幕后统治者。尽管她犯下了令人难以想象的暴行，但在治理殖民地方面能力极其出色。
languages.original_text: An intelligence report has come in stating that a Drukhari Archon is "playing at humans": having bent a high-ranking official to her will, she is now effectively running the colony from the shadows. She is committing unthinkable atrocities but is surprisingly good at governing.

traits.locale_text: 某份报告声称，黑暗灵族的某位执政官正在“操纵人类”。这位执政官操纵了政府的高级官员，成为了殖民地的幕后统治者。尽管她犯下了令人难以想象的暴行，但在治理殖民地方面能力极其出色。

languages.text: Un informe de inteligencia ha revelado que una Arconte Drukhari está «jugando a ser humana»: después de doblegar a un oficial de alto rango a su voluntad, está controlando la colonia desde las sombras. Comete atrocidades inimaginables, pero es sorprendentemente capaz como gobernante.
languages.original_text: An intelligence report has come in stating that a Drukhari Archon is "playing at humans": having bent a high-ranking official to her will, she is now effectively running the colony from the shadows. She is committing unthinkable atrocities but is surprisingly good at governing.

traits.locale_text: Un informe de inteligencia ha revelado que una Arconte Drukhari está «jugando a ser humana»: después de doblegar a un oficial de alto rango a su voluntad, está controlando la colonia desde las sombras. Comete atrocidades inimaginables, pero es sorprendentemente capaz como gobernante.

languages.text: Der Geheimdienst berichtet, dass eine Drukhari-Archontin "Mensch spielt": Sie hat sich einen hochrangigen Beamten unterworfen und herrscht nun aus den Schatten heraus über die Kolonie. Sie begeht unvorstellbare Gräueltaten, ist jedoch eine überraschend gute Herrscherin.
languages.original_text: An intelligence report has come in stating that a Drukhari Archon is "playing at humans": having bent a high-ranking official to her will, she is now effectively running the colony from the shadows. She is committing unthinkable atrocities but is surprisingly good at governing.

traits.locale_text: Der Geheimdienst berichtet, dass eine Drukhari-Archontin "Mensch spielt": Sie hat sich einen hochrangigen Beamten unterworfen und herrscht nun aus den Schatten heraus über die Kolonie. Sie begeht unvorstellbare Gräueltaten, ist jedoch eine überraschend gute Herrscherin.

languages.text: Bir istihbarat raporu, bir Drukhari Arkonu'nun "insancılık oynadığını" belirtiyor: Yüksek rütbeli bir memuru kuklası yaparak koloniyi gölgelerin ardından etkin bir şekilde yönetiyormuş. Akıl almaz zulümlere imza atsa da şaşırtıcı derecede yetenekli bir yönetici olduğu belli.
languages.original_text: An intelligence report has come in stating that a Drukhari Archon is "playing at humans": having bent a high-ranking official to her will, she is now effectively running the colony from the shadows. She is committing unthinkable atrocities but is surprisingly good at governing.
